TrbNetEntity.name: JtagController
TrbNetEntity.description: A JTAG controller for Pixel Sensors

register.name: JtagSwitch
register.description: Switches for JTAG for each sensor (old-style)

register.name: WaitBeforeStart
register.description: Wait time between write sequence and start signal.

field.name: WaitBeforeStart
field.description: The number of MAPS clock cycles to wait after last write before sending the start signal.

register.name: TriggerInitSeq
register.description: Trigger the init sequence.

field.name: TriggerInitSeq
field.description: A bitmask to trigger the init sequence on individual JTAG chains.

register.name: TriggerReset
register.description: Trigger the init sequence.

field.name: TriggerReset
field.description: A bitmask to trigger sending a reset pulse on individual JTAG chains

register.name: TriggerStart
register.description: Trigger sending a start pulse.

field.name: TriggerStart
field.description: A bitmask to trigger sending a start pulse on individual JTAG chains

register.name: TriggerJtagRun
register.description: Trigger running JTAG write.

field.name: TriggerJtagRun
field.description: A bitmask to trigger writing the JTAG registers three times on individual JTAG chains

register.name: ResetBeforeInit
register.description: Generate a reset before doing init sequence

field.name: ResetBeforeInit
field.description: Enable to send a reset pulse before starting init sequence

register.name: ResetAfterFirstWrite
register.description: Generate a reset after first register write sequence

field.name: ResetAfterFirstWrite
field.description: Enable to send a reset pulse after the first writing of JTAG registers

register.name: TriggerWriteOnce
register.description: Trigger writing all JTAG registers once

field.name: TriggerWriteOnce
field.description: Trigger writing all JTAG registers once on individual JTAG chains

register.name: JtagOverrideRegister
register.description: Sets fixed values for all outputs for JTAG and sensor control and inverts the outputs if needed. One register for each JTAG chain.

field.name: InvertTDO
field.description: Invert TDO input signal

field.name: InvertTDI
field.description: Invert TDI output signal

field.name: InvertTMS
field.description: Invert TMS output signal

field.name: InvertTCK
field.description: Invert TCK output signal

field.name: InvertStart
field.description: Invert Start output signal

field.name: InvertReset
field.description: Invert Reset output signal

field.name: InvertClock
field.description: Invert Clock output signal

field.name: EnableTDO
field.description: Enable TDO input signal

field.name: EnableTDI
field.description: Enable TDI output signal

field.name: EnableTMS
field.description: Enable TMS output signal

field.name: EnableTCK
field.description: Enable TCK output signal

field.name: EnableStart
field.description: Enable Start output signal

field.name: EnableReset
field.description: Enable Reset output signal

field.name: EnableClock
field.description: Enable Clock output signal

register.name: JtagErrorCount1
register.description: Error counters for read and write operations on the JTAG chain

field.name: ErrorsReadId
field.description: Number of read errors during "read id" operation

field.name: ErrorsWrite
field.description: Number of read errors during write operation

register.name: JtagErrorCount2
register.description: Error counters for read and write operations on the JTAG chain

field.name: ErrorsDataChanged
field.description: Number of times data read back from the sensor was not identical to the data written to the sensor.

field.name: ErrorsSampling
field.description: Number of sampling errors of TDI signal. The signal from the sensor is sampled three times for each bit, all occurrences must be equal.

register.name: JtagRunCounter
register.description: Number of times the JTAG controller run a full sequence

register.name: JtagStatusFlags
register.description: Status flags of the JTAG chain

field.name: JtagStarted
field.description: JTAG has been started

field.name: JtagLastSuccesful
field.description: Last JTAG run was successful

field.name: JtagLastDataChanged
field.description: Data in the sensor was corrupted at last JTAG run

field.name: JtagLastWriteError
field.description: Last run had a JTAG write error

field.name: JtagLastReadError
field.description: Last run had a JTAG read error

field.name: JtagCrcError
field.description: Last run had a JTAG CRC error

register.name: JtagRAM
register.description: RAM with content of JTAG registers for sensors. Contains several banks, one for each sensor

field.name: JtagRAM
field.description: content of JTAG registers in sensors

register.name: JtagReadbackRAM
register.description: RAM with content of JTAG registers read back from sensors. This RAM has to be explicitly updated by a slow-control command

field.name: JtagReadbackRAM
field.description: Read-back registers from sensors

group.name: JtagControl
group.description: Control and Status registers for each JTAG chain

group.name: JtagChainSetup
group.description: Setup of chain length and timing of JTAG signals

register.name: NumchipsConfigured
register.description: Number of sensors available in chain and in configuration RAM

register.name: JtagClockCycleLength
register.description: Duration of a JTAG clock cycle in system clock cycles

register.name: JtagClockTime1
register.description: Time of the rising edge of the TCK signal

register.name: JtagClockTime2
register.description: Time of the falling edge of the TCK signal

register.name: JtagClockSample1
register.description: First reading of TDO signal

register.name: JtagClockSample2
register.description: Second reading of TDO signal

register.name: JtagClockSample3
register.description: Third reading of TDO signal

register.name: JtagSetDataTime
register.description: Time of change on TDO and TMS signals

register.name: JtagDelayExpectValue
register.description: Delay of the return signal in TCK cycles

group.name: JtagChainStatus
group.description: Status information about the JTAG chain

register.name: JtagRunCount
register.description: Number of JTAG cycles

register.name: JtagNumchipsActive
register.description: Number of activated chips in chain

register.name: JtagTriggerCount
register.description: Number of JTAG cycle triggers (aka off-spill triggers)

register.name: JtagLastNotRemoved
register.description: Number of the last, not removed sensor in the chain

register.name: JtagCrcStatus
register.description: Flags for each sensor, set if CRC of read-back values matched

group.name: JtagChainControl
group.description: Control registers for the JTAG chain

register.name: JtagStart
register.description: Control operation of JTAG chain

field.name: JtagRefreshActive
field.description: Activates waiting for the Off-Spill-Trigger. i.e. activates the JTAG refresh (jtag_refresh_active)

field.name: JtagCheck1Active
field.description: Disables writing to JTAG registers, read-back only (jtag_check1_active)

register.name: JtagRemoveSensor
register.description: Control register to insert or remove individual sensors from the chain

field.name: JtagRemoveSensorNumber
field.description: The number of the sensor that should be removed or inserted

field.name: JtagRemoveSensorState
field.description: Selects whether the sensor should be removed (1) or inserted (0)

register.name: JtagCsOptions
register.description: Set CS Options

field.name: JtagBypassTestchain
field.description: Skip bypass_reg_testchain if set

register.name: JtagRamBaseAddr
register.description: Set CS Options

field.name: JtagRamBaseAddr
field.description: Base address for JTAG register RAM

group.name: JtagChainDebug
group.description: Control registers for the JTAG chain debugging

register.name: JtagSetBreakpoint
register.description: Set Breakpoint to stop state machine according to VHDL code

register.name: JtagCopyRam3
register.description: Trigger copy of error counter RAM

register.name: JtagCopyRam1
register.description: Trigger copy of JTAG read-back RAM

field.name: JtagCopyRamReadError
field.description: Trigger copy of JTAG read-back RAM on read error

field.name: JtagCopyRamWriteError
field.description: Trigger copy of JTAG read-back RAM on write error

field.name: JtagCopyRamDataChanged
field.description: Trigger copy of JTAG read-back RAM on data changed

field.name: JtagCopyRamNextRun
field.description: Trigger copy of JTAG read-back RAM after next run

register.name: JtagFsmState
register.description: Trigger copy of error counter RAM

register.name: JtagRam1RunCounter
register.description: Run counter at the time RAM1 was copied

register.name: JtagRam1ChainStatus
register.description: Chain status at the time RAM1 was copied

register.name: JtagRam3RunCounter
register.description: Run counter at the time RAM3 was copied

register.name: JtagRam3ChainStatus
register.description: Chain status at the time RAM3 was copied

register.name: JtagErrorCounters
register.description: RAM with error counters for individual registers and sensors. Needs to be updated via slow-control command

field.name: JtagErrorCounters
field.description: Error Counters for JTAG registers
